reviews.review:
This game saved my life.

I am 27.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 fucking minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

Ricochet

Это было круто! Слишком круто для 16МБ!
Только жаль, что онлайн здесь явление редкое...

Ricochet is one of the best games ever made. Battle other players(on the rare once-a-decade opportunity there are any) with discs arcoss... Three? Three maps. Enjoy the gold source engine at its peak in this black void with TRON-inspired aesthetic and frustrating design choice and sound design as you sometimes are lucky enough to behind someone granted you can get a power shot power up. No valve logos anywhere... I wonder why. The lack of lore makes it very easy for players to project a personality on the multi-colored player everyone gets to be. Enjoy hearing the death scream and falling animation en mass.
Ricochet

Ricochet is an underrated classic video game made by valve. It involves you and 15 others in complete purgatory fighting each other with tron discs and bright lights. You'll literally lose your head playing this game. The advanced combat is too much for our simpleton brains. I will recommend this game to anyone with an IQ above 200 such as myself and my friends.
Game of the Century.

This forgotten early Valve title is far from a masterpiece, yet it's still a fun and competitive game that tests your agility in ways that are not as apparent as first. Being a Goldsrc game, its movement quirks such as air-strafing add a layer of depth that not everyone will realize during their first playthrough. 
While potential for the gameplay isn't exactly limitless, it's still sad to know that Valve's original plans to keep on supporting this game never panned out. However with it's rising meme potential, It'd be up for the community to revive it or preserve it as that bare-bones Valve title that gathers dust on their shelf.
Ricochet.

When i was a boy i  dreamed of a video game that would truly be a defining for the medium and one that would firmly revolutionize the way we see video games. For many years i lingered playing less than stellar games like Goldeneye, Mario, and Half life 2 then one fateful day as i looked upon the steam market place a colorful little title caught my eye, Ricochet....
I jumped into a game immediately on septemper 14, 2014 and my world changed. I untied the noose from my ceiling knowing that i could continue onwards now that i had truly experienced all that gaming has to offer.... This game is an ambient exploration singleplayer experience, Its fucking magnificent, each level an interactive painting forever immortilizing 
mans urge to innovate and "Raise the bar". Every night i turn on ricochet, join an empty server and i just set, look and hear the vast living worlds created by artisian masters well on the level of the great thinkers of the past.

This game has brought tears to my eyes. The first time I launched this game, I was greeted by such a lovely and involving russian community, they started shouting things at me which I assume were some welcoming words, it was just beautiful.

10/10. Flawless game design, great community, love it.

Honestly, just a classic game. Loved every second of it, there's nothing like jumping from platform to platform in a style quite distinct to this futuristic hoop throwing multiplayer game. Vertigo was quite a big issue though, if you're afraid of heights then you should steer clear of this one. Recommended.

Solid 3/5
Holy fuck I love this game. The thrill of knocking your opponent off the ledge while in the air is so epic.
Good game to play while waiting for HLVR

*****Most Real Review On Ricochet*****     First I Will Start With Posting What I Said In My Discussion (Read This First)------------------------------>"#BringBackRicochet (or start it)
RICOCHET ON STEAM IS SUPPOSEDLY: "A futuristic action game that challenges your agility as well as your aim, Ricochet features one-on-one and team matches played in a variety of futuristic battle arenas." 

BUT REALLY IT'S: A Tron-like semi-action filled game that challenges your agility along with your ability to play this game for an hour without getting bored, it features one-on-one and team matches in kind of really boring and plain maps and battle arena.

PEOPLE ASK: what makes this game so boring? it could be that it only has like 3 small boring maps, it could be that it has semi-poor design, it could be that there is virtually nothing to do in it, it could be that you can't shoot up or down, but i think, it's because there is nobody playing it ever.

CAN THIS GAME BE FUN?: when you get this game it seems like the worst game you have ever played, but if you play it with friends or really anyone the game gets quite a lot better so if you get your friends to play their friends play etc. we might be able to get tons of players on it..... maybe.

THIS GAME IS ABOUT TO BE 20 YEARS OLD: 
RELEASE DATE:Nov 1, 2000
Maybe just maybe if we get enough people having fun on this game we could maybe get the devs to spruce it up a bit, ya know make it really fun the thing is almost nobody plays it so they are not going to care about it if there isn't anyone who actually plays it

HOW CAN WE PLAY THIS GAME RIGHT NOW WITHOUT GETTING TOO BORED?: There are actually mods for it! (i know, it's shocking someone took time to do it) but most of em work and they are pretty cool, they add new maps that are more than just neon arrow pads. I am personally going to make some mods for it and i hope whoever reads this does too, it'll really get more players on it.

THINGS YOU PROBABLY DIDN'T KNOW ABOUT RICOCHET: There many glitches bugs and unfinished pieces in this game here are a few of them: #1. when playing the game sometimes a half life browser icon appears instead of a ricochet one. #2. If you press "T" on your keyboard you can spray-paint a chosen icon (can be chosen in settings) you can paint it sometimes or every time you score a point (when you KO somebody). #3. if you press the "E" or "Shift" on your keyboard it slows your character. #4. When entering a ricochet match a grenade is sometimes displayed in your characters hand, but it quickly disappears when you finish spawning in. #5. If you change the brightness settings at all and the game glitches and does not kick you out like it says it will, then your characters right hand is visible but it looks different than it actually is, it is wearing a black glove and has a brown sleeve, in that weird looking hand there is a grenade (just like i stated previously but it stays in your hand), when holding the grenade you can still throw discs, but when the grenade is in your hand those jump arrows everywhere don't work instead of making you jump they just don't do anything so then you fall to your death.

RICOCHET TIPS: here are my few tips (the game doesn't exactly have many elements to create strategies to) but here they are: #1. when you land and there is someone on the platform you are landing on quickly shoot a decapitation disc at them as soon as you almost land. #2. when waiting on a platform the second someone lands shoot a decapitation shot it's basically an instant kill because people land before thinking all the time. #3. always look around, the maps are really small so unless you look around you will be constantly dying. #4. when a player shoots a disc at you it's not game over either move out of the way or if that is too difficult or not really possible at the moment then shoot normal discs back at those discs it prevents your opponent's discs from hitting you if you shoot a disc at their disc. #5. collect power ups (this one is obvious) it really makes the game easier. #6. isn't it so annoying when you try to get to another platform but you end up landing on it and sliding off the side? well i have a solution to that, as i said earlier if you press "E" or "Shift" on keyboard it slows your character well it also prevents you from sliding, so when you are about to land on a platform press and hold "E" or "Shift" it makes the game even easier.

IS THIS GAME WORTH BUYING?: I would say if you have friends playing it with you or there are people on the servers then yes totally, also it'll go on sale for like 49 cents so just get it then.

HELP ME START THIS GAME: normally i would say help me bring it back, but i'm pretty sure it has always been dead you can mod it and it is actually fun with other people also like i said it is almost 20 years old so maybe the devs will be like: "wow we made that a while ago oh guys look at this there are 400 players online since there are so many players we should give it a 20th anniversary update". or maybe they'll be like "Meh" but either way it'll make the game a lot more fun if we get enough players so you can ask me questions in this discussion send me a friend request or whatever just at least join the discussion."

^That Up There Is Everything About The Game....      

!!!!!!!!!!FOR PEOPLE WHO DON'T WANT TO READ THE ENTIRE REVIEW!!!!!!!!!!--------------->The Game Is Completely And Utterly Dead, Normally As I Explained In My Post The Game Is Pretty Boring And Pointless, There Are A Few Maps, A Few Power-Ups, And A Rare Chance Of Anyone Being Online, But, If You Get Mods On It.....       .....It Becomes A Lot Of Fun To Play With Your Friends. It Also Goes On Sale For 50 Cents So I Mean You Really Can't Go Wrong It's Like "Get A Gumball? Or Get Ricochet?" Most Of The Good User Reviews For This Game Are Trolls. To Sum This Up It's Boring Without Mods, Nobody Online,And Will Make You Laugh So Hard You'll Probably Cry


                      -Omastar (pipofthieves)

BREAKING: "Ricochet 2" Announced As Epic Games Store Exclusive Releasing In 2020.

At a press conference Valve gave an hour ago as of the time of writing, CEO Gabe Newell announced a sequel to the highly popular FPS "Ricochet", to release exclusively for the Epic Games Store next year. "We have decided to bring back the highly praised Ricochet franchise for release on the Epic Games Store in the year 2020." Gabe Newell stated after the 30 second announcement trailer played.

The announcement has been riddled with criticism from long time fans of the first game. One former fan, who wished to remain anonymous, said "I picked up the game in 2002 after graduating school, and I think it's a fucking disgrace that the sequel is going to a platform that has almost none of the same features as Steam.". 

Others are excited for it's release on the storefront. Derek Marshall, 12, stated "I can't wait to play it once, maybe throw that disc thing around for a bit, and then never play it again when the Fortnite servers go back up.", before chugging a can of Monster Energy and calling his friends over Discord on his medium-range laptop.

It is not known if Ricochet 2 will ever release on Steam. We'll keep you updated as the story continues.
Best game. Five stars * * * * *
dead

The first 5 hours of playing this game make you question the design choices and get annoyed by the physics. Once you discover how power air-strafing and generally good positioning this game becomes a masterpiece. The biggest downside to the game is the fact that very few people are online, however, if you play with friends this is a party game on the same level as smash bros.

Some people have tried to start semi active ricochet revival communities. They all die out rather soon. I was one of the first recruits to join one and we had a nice community of 8 people who would play semi frequently, but of course we forgot and the community died out.

I cant really put into words how much i love this game but I'm still gonna try. The joy of meeting someone outside of your friends list who is insane enough to play this game is unparalleled. One time i met a russian god who just had his airstrafes on point and really taught me how much further there was to go to reach the peak skill level of this game.

Ricoc Communindad Hellfish will always stay close to my heart as the best server in the game. Seeing AMX MOD X popups is as comforting as drinking hot chocolate on a cold winter night. The drab tron colour scheme instills a sense of homeliness in me as i turn the game on. Hearing a shop counter beep the exact same way the game beeps before changing maps fills my whole body with nostalgia. The screams of death as people fall of the map will be forever ingrained into your brain as absurd but entertaining moments of your life.

If you can get your friends to play this masterpiece do so. Its pretty shit to begin with but it grows on you more than any other game.

Its an acquired taste, but euphoric once the taste is acquired.
Not too much to say. The gameplay is so hard and it's also a DEAD game. DON'T BUY IT, THERE'LL BE 0 PLAYERS FOREVER.

It’s fun, and if you bought the valve pack (like I did and I would recommend doing) it’s a good addition, but by itself unless it’s on super sale it’s hard to justify a $5 price tag. It gets a little repetitive after a while, particularly in the sound department. I would say buy the valve complete pack and play it then or if you really want this game separately wait for a sale.

Ricochet is actually a pretty fun game, but doesn't hold up as a $5 buy. If you and some friends got it as a part of the Valve Complete Pack, download it and play around. It's not the next Half-Life, but you'll probably blow an hour or so figuring out the controls and playing Tron.
游戏性来讲是挺优秀的挺大开脑洞的一项作品，符合Value一向的风格，但毕竟19年了，只剩下了几个鬼服。。当然如果你能找到跟你一起玩的基友的话那我只能酸了

This is the best game valve has released hands down no balls. I am literally going to slice all of my toes off simultaneously if valve does not release a ricochet 2, 3, 4, and 5 in the next 3 months. This game is like if Christmas and National Poetry Month was everyday and also my birthday. I wish I had me a 6th finger so I could play me some more ricochet. The gameplay is dynamic and like no other, it's like if minecraft and fortnite combined into one. This game feels like if vr was ahead of it's time. Playing this game brought tears to my eyes and my 26 adopted Somalian children's eyes aswell. It is encapsulates the definition of masterpiece in every shape or form possible. Thank you Gabe for this showing me the light and allowing me to experience true holiness for my very eyes. I love you Gabe, good night my sweet prince.

Richochet is the best game Valve has ever produced and I'm angry that they didn't do Richochet 2. Fuck you, Valve.

Ricochet is an underrated classic video game made by valve. It involves you and 15 others in complete purgatory fighting each other with tron discs and bright lights.  You'll literally lose your head playing this game. The advanced combat is too much for our simpleton brains. I will recommend this game to anyone with an IQ above 200 such as myself and my friends.
Полная х**нь. Сервер только один, людей нет, интерес пропадает после 1 минуты, карта одна и она маленькая. Вообщем прыгаешь по островкам и кидаешь бумеранги...
ennuyeux a mourir. Bref le pire jeu de Valve
